title: Stovall Portraits for sale (breaking up a back run)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Stovall Portraits for sale (breaking up a back run)
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and assume a no-fee payment method.  Please add 3% if you want to use Paypal Goods.

Both Sovereigns are really nice for the grade.  The PSA A P150 is trimmed.  I also have EPDG and SC 350/25 backs, but they are off at PSA at the moment (and have been for a time).  If you need of those, let me know and maybe we can work something out when I get them back.

Piedmont 150 PSA 4 $73
Piedmont 150 PSA A $28
Sweet Cap 150/25 SGC 50 $63
Sovereign 150 PSA 2 $93  SOLD
Sovereign 350 SGC 40 $63 SOLD
Bump for some nice looking cards.
